00019 MainWindow::MainWindow()
00020     : Aki::MainWindow()
00021 {
00022     setTopRightCorner(new Aki::ViewTabBar(this));
00023     setView(new Aki::View);
00024     createMenus();
00025     createDialogs();

00032 void MainWindow::createMenus()
00033 {
00034     KAction* action = new KAction(i18n("Network List"), this);
00035     actionCollection()->addAction(QLatin1String("akiNetworkList"), action);
00036     connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00037             SLOT(serverListTriggered()));
00038 
00039     action = new KAction(i18n("Server Tab"), this);
00040     actionCollection()->addAction(QLatin1String("akiNewServerTab"), action);
00041 
00042     action = new KAction(i18n("Channel Tab"), this);
00043     actionCollection()->addAction(QLatin1String("akiNewChannelTab"), action);
00044 
00045     action = new KAction(i18n("Quick Connection"), this);
00046     actionCollection()->addAction(QLatin1String("akiQuickConnection"), action);
00047 
00048     action = new KAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("edit-redo")), i18n("Reconnect"), this);
00049     actionCollection()->addAction(QLatin1String("akiReconnect"), action);
00050 
00051     action = new KAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("edit-delete")), i18n("Disconnect"), this);
00052     actionCollection()->addAction(QLatin1String("akiDisconnect"), action);
00053 
00054     action = new KAction(KIcon(QLatin1String("application-exit")), i18n("Quit"), this);
00055     connect(action, SIGNAL(triggered(bool)),
00056             SLOT(quitTriggered()));
00057     actionCollection()->addAction(QLatin1String("akiQuit"), action);
00058     setupGUI(ToolBar | Keys | StatusBar | Create);
00059 }

00061 void
00062 MainWindow::createDialogs()
00063 {
00064     _serverDialog = new ServerDialog(this);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void
00068 MainWindow::serverListTriggered()
00069 {
00070     _serverDialog->show();
00071 }
